articles.title: 'Mounting misery': Israeli attacks on Gaza kill 81 Palestinians in 24 hours
articles.description: Israeli attacks on al-Tuffah claims lives of 20 people.

articles.title: Hundreds of thousands mourn top Iranian military commanders and scientists killed in Israeli strikes
articles.description: Hundreds of thousands of mourners gathered in Tehran for the funeral of top Iranian commanders and scientists killed in a 12-day war with Israel.

articles.title: Senators prep for a weekend of work to meet Trump's deadline for passing his tax and spending cuts
articles.description: The Senate is expected to grind through a rare weekend session as Republicans race to pass President Donald Trump's package of tax breaks and spending cuts by his July Fourth deadline.
